short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Used to darken the look of the BBC website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The lean and clean dark theme built to accommodate the BBC. Compatible with (nearly) every BBC page, make reading articles that little easier on the eyes. 

Permission details:
Access to BBC - used for darkening the BBC website.


Open source code available at: https://github.com/Recol/BBC-Dark
